Wade: "We sell Chicago by the way we play. This is an organization that wants to get right back into it. That sells itself."
Wade: "I'm gonna be texting Jimmy, making sure we build the camaraderie before we even report to training camp."
Wade: "We have three alphas, three strong personalities, three leaders...that's great for coach, great for the team."
Wade: "We have some special talent, some young guys that can play, but we have to get to work."
Wade: "Our job is to come out here from day one and start working. Building the team that we want to be on the floor."
Wade: "I think it's great to be here knowing that the organization supports its players and supports the Chicago community."
Wade: "Whatever minutes I play this year, I'm going to be productive. Go out there and do my job."
Wade: "For this team, the future's still bright. This signing is a win-win for me and the Bulls organization. A win for Chicago."
"Rondo is someone I've competed against so much, but we were competing for championships. I want to play with a guy like that." -@DwyaneWade
Wade: "It's our duty as veteran players to give our knowledge back to the organization...I'm a leader. It's all I know how to do."
Wade: "At the end of the day this is the place I wanted to be...I wanted to be where my heart was telling me to go."
Wade: "I want to be a part of coming here and building this organization back up to where it should be."
Wade: "At the end of the day it was my decision to live out a dream of mine. I want to bring the love to Chicago."
Wade: "I'm going to play my game and do what the team needs to me."
Wade: "We have guys who can make shots. I am a better three point shooter than my numbers...I showed that in the playoffs."
Wade: "It's about winning. The individual stuff comes from that. We all have one common goal...and that's to win."
Wade: "This wouldn't have happened if it wasn't for Jimmy Butler."
Wade: "Jimmy Butler is the young bull on this team. We're going to depend on him a lot."
Wade: "They gave me a Bulls jersey in 2010. I went home, put it on, took a picture..."
Wade: "This is a place I really wanted to be...a place my heart pulled me towards."
@YwillCR7 The sound should be working on all streams - Bulls app, Facebook page or website.
Wade: "I can't tell you guys what this means to me."
Wade: "I remember watching a little TV watching the Bulls win a title and realize that this was what I wanted to do."
Wade: "This is one of those moments that is a dream come true. I'm a Chicago kid."
Gar: "We've got 10 players with 3 years or less experience. To have Wade show them the way, you can't put a value on that."
